  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Martin Luther King, Jr.'s "I Have A Dream" speech</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Martin Luther König, jr. "ich habe eine Traum" 
Rede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le roi de Martin Luther, Jr. "j'ai" un discours 
rêveur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei de Martin Luther, Jr. "eu tenho" um discurso 
ideal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Re del Martin Luther, Jr. "ho" un discorso di 
sogno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Μαρτην Luther King, νεώτεοί "ομιλία έχω ενός 
ονείρου"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rey de Martin Luther, Jr.es "tengo" un discurso 
ideal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will display their understanding of the symbolism and references that Dr. King used to enrich his famous speech on August 28, 1963 from the steps of the Lincoln Memorial by constructing a "jackdaw," a collection of documents and objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer zeigen ihr Verständnis des 
Symbolismus und der Referenzen an, denen Dr. König pflegte, seine 
berühmte Rede an August 28, 1963 anzureichern von den Jobsteps des 
Lincoln Denkmals, indem er ein "jackdaw," eine Ansammlung Dokumente 
und Nachrichten konstruierte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants afficheront leur arrangement du 
symbolisme et des références que le Dr. King avait l'habitude 
d'enrichir son discours célèbre 28 août 1963 des étapes du 
mémorial de Lincoln en construisant un "jackdaw," une collection de 
documents et des objets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes indicarão sua compreensão do 
simbolismo e das referências que o Dr. rei se usou enriquecer seu 
discurso famoso agosto em 28, 1963 das etapas do memorial de Lincoln 
construindo um "jackdaw," uma coleção dos originais e objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi visualizzeranno la loro comprensione 
dello symbolism e dei riferimenti che il Dott. re ha usato arricchire 
il suo discorso famoso il 28 agosto 1963 dai punti del memoriale de 
Lincoln costruendo "un jackdaw," una raccolta di documenti ed oggetti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα παρουσιάσουν την κατανόησή τους του 
συμβολισμού και των αναφορών που ο Δρ King χρησιμοποίησε για να 
εμπλουτίσει τη διάσημη ομιλία του στις 28 Αυγούστου ..1963 
από τα βήματα του μνημείου του Λίνκολν με την κατασκευή μιας 
"κάργας," μια συλλογή των εγγράφων και των αντικειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes visualizarán su comprensión del 
simbolismo y de las referencias que el Dr. rey enriquecía su discurso
famoso 28 de agosto de 1963 de los pasos de progresión del 
monumento de Lincoln construyendo un "jackdaw," una colección de 
documentos y los objetos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
